        public Obstacle(android.graphics.Bitmap obs_image,
                int x,
                int y,
                int w,
                int h,
                int s)
        Constructor for the Obstacle View.
        Parameters:
        obs_image - The Image to use as an Obstacle
        x - The x co-ordinate of the obstacle
        y - The y co-ordinate of the obstacle
        w - The width in pixels of the obstacle
        h - The height in pixels of the obstacle
        s - The Score
